name: @gsong/ccmcp
description: Claude Code MCP Selector - Intelligently discover, validate, and select MCP server configurations for Claude Code
author: George Song

scripts.release:patch: git status --porcelain | grep -q . && echo 'Working directory not clean' && exit 1 || (NEW_VERSION=$(npm version patch --no-git-tag-version) && npm run generate-release-notes $NEW_VERSION && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release $NEW_VERSION" && git tag -a "$NEW_VERSION" -F .tmp-tag-notes.txt && npm run clean-release-files && git push --follow-tags && npm run build && npm run npm-publish)
